contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox German location |image_photo = |Wappen = Wappen Kallmerode.png |lat_deg = 51 |lat_min = 21 |lat_sec = 2 |lon_deg = 10 |lon_min = 18 |lon_sec = 23 |Lageplan = Kallmerode in EIC.svg |Bundesland = Thüringen |Landkreis = Eichsfeld |Verwaltungsgemeinschaft = Dingelstädt |Höhe = 375 |Fläche = 5.59 |Einwohner = 606 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 37327 |Vorwahl = 03605 |Kfz = EIC |Gemeindeschlüssel = 16 0 61 054 |Adresse-Verband = Geschwister-Scholl-Str. 26/28<br />37351 Dingelstädt |Website = |Bürgermeister = Marion Weise }} '''Kallmerode''' is a [[Thuringia]]n municipality in the district of [[Eichsfeld (district)|Eichsfeld]] in Germany. {{Cities and towns in Eichsfeld (district)}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Eichsfeld-geo-stub}}
